Text: ClosingJust wanted to make sure everything went ok I neglected to remind you again when we talked today about obtaining the Certificate of Occupancy so I hope that the Seller delivered it as she had promised If not let me know so that we can find an immediate solution The only other things I would caution you on at this point would be as follows Make sure to put together your list of warranty repairs prior to days from todays date and to deliver same to the Seller within such time period per the warranty agreement Make sure to follow up with the Seller about the fireplace She is supposed to finish that work within days from todays date Make sure to compare your title policy when it comes in the mail to the marked Title Commitment you received today There shouldnt be anything in the policy that is not in the Title Commitment When you get the policy you can send a copy to me and I will be glad to confirm this for you You should get the recorded deed in the mail from the title company or the county clerk If you do not receive it within days call the title company and ask that they find it or obtain a certified copy for you If there is anything you need just let me know Ron I Erlichman Bracewell Patterson LLP Louisiana Suite Houston Texas email
